item.title: How Long Does It Really Take to Form a Habit? (The 21-Day Myth Debunked)
item.description: Forget the 21-day myth. We dive into the science from a 2009 UCL study to reveal how long it really takes to form a habit (the answer may surprise you) and why consistency is king.
